text: Douglas L. Allison (born July 12, 1846 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, died December 19, 1916 in Washington, DC) was a professional baseball catcher for the Cincinnati Red Stockings, the first fully professional baseball team. == Other websites == *Baseball-Reference.com - career statistics and analysis Category:19th-century American baseball players Category:Sportspeople from Philadelphia Category:1846 births Category:1916 deaths
title: Doug Allison
